= Welcome to the gwt-cx Wiki =

The goal of this wiki is to provide an overview of why and how to use gwt-cx in your next project.

We welcome any questions, comments or suggestions you may have on the framework. Please contact us on the [http://groups.google.com/group/gwt-cx gwt-cx  discussion group] or email us at gwt-cx@googlegroups.com

Please use the menu on the left to navigate around our wiki.
